title: Telematics Vendor
description: Vendor's parameters returned by the endpoint - https://production-api-telematics.route4me.com/api/vendors

is_enabled.title: Is Enabled
is_enabled.description: If eaqual to 1, the vendor is enabled.

is_readonly.title: Is Readonly
is_readonly.description: If eaqual to 1, the vendor is readonly.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: the icon associated with the vendor

name.title: Name
name.description: The credential's name of the telematics vendor

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: If true, the credential is required
